nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_665
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Despite the fact that she is the only child in her family, she is never babied by her parents.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_666
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Mike didn't come to the party last night, nor did he call me to give an explanation.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_667
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The person sitting next to him did publish some novels, but he is by no means a great writer.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_668
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He has no interest in football and is indifferent to who wins or loses.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_669
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The manager needs an assistant that he can count on to take care of problems in his absence.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_670
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: This is the first time that he has made a speech in the presence of so large an audience.
